Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires retailers of electric batteries and bicycles to provide customers with an operating manual and requires residential leases to contain a lease rider regarding the charging of electric batteries
Summary: Requires retailers of bicycles with electric assist and lithium ion electric batteries to provide customers with an operating manual; requires residential leases to contain a lease rider indicating that the tenant agrees to not use electrical outlets for charging of electric batteries in such leased residence.
LawCode: Add ยง391-cc, Gen Bus L; add ยง235-j, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring retailers of bicycles with electric assist and electric batteries to provide customers with an operating manual; and to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring residential leases to contain a lease rider indicating that the tenant agrees to not use electrical outlets for charging of electric batteries in such leased residence
